definitions.definition: To move from one location to another in an apparently random and frivolous manner.
To run with the tail in the air , bent over the back , usually in an attempt to escape the warble fly .

main_definition: ( intransitive ) To move from one location to another in an apparently random and frivolous manner.
secondary_definitions: ( of cattle ) To run with the tail in the air , bent over the back , usually in an attempt to escape the warble fly .
